alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Polk, eastern Madison, southeastern Dallas and Warren Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grimes to near Lakeside Casino. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Des Moines, Urbandale, Clive, Waukee, Windsor Heights, Valley West Mall, Merle Hay Mall and Jordan Creek Town Center around 1150 PM CDT. Johnston, Grimes and Granger around 1155 PM CDT. Saylorville and Saylorville Lake around 1200 AM CDT. Polk City around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Indianola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 45 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 99. Interstate 80 between mile markers 111 and 145. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
